node1.PC_Text: Would you like anything from the cafe?
Would you like to eat lunch with me?
node1.NPC_Response: Thank you but I already ate.

node1.PC_Text: Can I take a two hour lunch break?
node1.NPC_Response: Um, we usually only take one hour.

A.PC_Text: OK, would you mind if I go get a coffee now?
Can I get you a coffee or tea? You look like you could really  use it!
Can I borrow a few dollars for a coffee? I forgot my wallet.
A.NPC_Response: I'm sorry, I don't have any money on me.

B.PC_Text: OK, no problem. Can I take my lunch now?
Could I go eat my lunch in the garden? It's so nice outside!
B.NPC_Response: Sure, I enjoy eating there myself.

B.PC_Text: I wish you waited for me! Can we eat together tomorrow?
B.NPC_Response: I usually eat lunch at my desk but thanks.

C.PC_Text: Ok, I understand. Can I go buy lunch at the cafeteria?
C.NPC_Response: Of course.  I would recommend the pizza.

C.PC_Text: My last job always let me take two hour lunches.
C.NPC_Response: Well, here at Acme Tech we only take one hour.

C.PC_Text: Could I just take a nap then?  I was just going to zone out at my desk anyway!
C.NPC_Response: Well, I think we can find some work for you to do.

AA.NPC_Response: Um, you're welcome. And just Mike will do.

AB.NPC_Response: Well, I am a bit tired.

AB.PC_Text: Seriously, Mike, have you looked in the mirror? The bags under your eyes tell a different story!

AC.PC_Text: That's alright. I'll see if Fran has any.
That's alright, I'll just steal one!
AC.NPC_Response: Uh, haha, I hope you're joking…

AC.PC_Text: It’s ok! I'll just flirt with the cashier. That always works when you look as good as I do!
AC.NPC_Response: Yes, well, good luck with that I suppose.

BA.PC_Text: Thanks! I'll bring you back a cookie.
BA.NPC_Response: That's not necessary but thank you.

BA.PC_Text: Do you want to share my sandwich with me? It's peanut butter and jelly, just like my mom used to make!
BA.NPC_Response: Uhh, that sounds nice but no thank you.

BB.PC_Text: I like chasing the dragonflies! They're so fast.
I saw a beautiful plant out there that I want to dig up and take home with me!

BC.PC_Text: OK, I understand.  Maybe another time.
OK, I can eat at your desk with you.
BC.NPC_Response: I meant I prefer to eat alone.

BC.PC_Text: I knowI I was watching you through your window.  You're a loud chewer.
BC.NPC_Response: I would prefer you didn’t do that.

CA.PC_Text: Thanks, Mike! I'll give it a try!
I'm sure it's not as good as the pizza my grandmother makes.
Are you crazy? I can’t eat pizza on a Monday! It’s bad luck! I'll get struck by lightning!
CA.NPC_Response: I really don’t think that's true.

CB.PC_Text: OK, that's fine. I'll be back in an hour.
CB.NPC_Response: I'm sure it will be plenty of time.

CB.PC_Text: That's not enough time to eat and go for my daily swim! I have to wait 30 minutes to digest.
CB.NPC_Response: I would suggest swimming after work.

CB.PC_Text: My last job was so much better than this one. Our lunches lasted all afternoon sometimes!

CC.PC_Text: OK, you're right. I'd be happy to do whatever you need.
I have work to do. I'm just not interested!
CC.NPC_Response: I'm sorry but that's part of your job.

CC.PC_Text: I'm not getting paid enough to work hard, Mike.  You should know that!
CC.NPC_Response: I don’t know that, Annie and  I really don't agree.
